amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Buildings and Facilities account by $1 million and to increase funding for the Agricultural Marketing Service account by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Buildings and Facilities account by $1 million and to increase funding for the Agricultural Marketing Service account by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clarke (MI) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 282 (Roll no. 426).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Clarke (MI) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 142 - 282 (Roll no. 426).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Clarke (MI).
